data.name: Desktop Icons [Intergalactic Traveler: The Omega Sector]
data.detailed_description:
Customize the appearance of your folders, shortcuts and applications using the icons of the intergalactic space of the Omega sector.

you will see a variety of 25 different models to choose from and each of them comes in four different sizes, the available dimensions are 16x16, 32x32, 48x48, 256x256, so that you can choose the one that suits you according to the situation.

The icons are based on the items of the base game Intergalactic Traveler: The Omega Sector and consist of the following:

1) The Start button [Ultra Spedd]
2) The Imagen of the goal "goal" [Ultra Spedd]
3) the image of the right direction Token [Omega speed].
4) The image of the left direction Token [Omega speed].
5) the image of the up direction Token [Omega speed].
6) The image of the Down direction Token [Omega speed].
7) The indicative direction of the right arrow [Ultra Spedd].
8) The indicative direction of the left arrow [Ultra Spedd].
9) The indicative direction of the Up arrow [Ultra Spedd].
10) The indicative direction of the Down Arrow [Ultra Spedd].
11) The item of 50 HP.
12) The item of 250 HP.
13) The Audio Receptors item.
14) The item of the Blue Shield.
15) The item of Defensive Shield.
16) The item of the Complete Restore.
17) The image of the token dimensional.
18) The item of the E-bit.
19) The Energetic Skill type 1.
20) The Energetic Skill type 2.
21) The item for the Fuel.
22) The icon of a Golden Gear.
23) The item of the Hyper Jump.
24) The item that serves to Level Up.
25) The exit area of each scenario.

Remember that you can also change the general personalization of the icons of your PC in the section of the Control Panel, as the appearance of the icon of the computer; of that way you can have a more dynamic environment with the items of the game!

The files are in the ICO format, so this DLC is designed for its function in Windows operating system; remember to use the dimensions of 256x256 for best results if the icon will have to be shown automatically in various sizes along the Pc. In other cases you may need the 16x16 for specific thumbnails.

The DLC will be downloaded in the original route of the base game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
